title: One "Lying" Pastor's Take on why Jordan Peterson Doesn't Go to Church
description:
Jordan Peterson's answers about the church were so fertile I had to make a video to talk about them. He basically articulated the declining heyday of the Cold War Protestant Mainline while putting his finger on a central tension in Christianity since Christ which exploded in the Protestant Reformation. These are the pressure points that his efforts illuminate. 

New Years Q/A Video https://youtu.be/1pNn91Ewzbc 
George Marsden's book https://www.amazon.com/Twilight-American-Enlightenment-Crisis-Liberal-ebook/dp/B00IHGVPG2
